skillTree.name: Fireheart
skillTree.description: A mighty steed long of leg and wide of girth, taller than a man and possessed of a fiery spirit, this warhorse is the personal mount of Grigori.

skillTree.name: Harsh Survivor
skillTree.description: Rest is for the weak; one must harry the enemy in relentless pursuit and leave them no time to regroup.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Taunt
skillTree.description: Grigori has a mouth on him, and it's one that no opponent can resist, even against their will. He's just that irritating.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Bulwark of the North
skillTree.description: Ever since the Norsca first raided his village, Grigori has made it a personal mission to see the Chaos-worshipping dogs whipped back to their homes. He doesn't mind smashing a demon or two along the way, either.

effects.description:
Leadership: +3 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +5 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +9 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Stand Firm
skillTree.description: The people of Kislev need every bit of help they can get. And Grigori, for all that he doesn't think of himself as a leader, is a damn good leader.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Stand Firm" for Kossovite units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Swig of Kvass
skillTree.description: The sweet nectar of the Kislevites restores and warms, rehabilitating the body and soul of the drinker.

skillTree.name: Last Gasp
skillTree.description: During one of his travels to the frigid north Grigori was led to safety by a wolf spirit. Since that day, the spirit comes to save him anytime he is in danger.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Inviolable
skillTree.description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Grigori Medvezhiy
backgroundSkills.description: A muscular Kislevite, raised in his father's forge, Grigori came of age when he slew his first Norscan by choking the life from the foul savage with his bare hands.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -15% for Kossovite units.
	(all units in army)
